DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate effectiveness mental health mobile app ( CopeSmart ) promote positive mental health emotional self-awareness adolescent . Participants recruit second-level school Ireland . Schools randomly assign intervention control condition . Participants intervention condition use CopeSmart four week period . Those control condition use mental health app .
DOC.brief_title: CopeSmart : Using Mobile Technology Promote Positive Mental Health Young People
DOC.criteria: Must 14 19 year Must enrol secondlevel education Must access iPhone , iTouch Android mobile device Must obtain signed parental consent participate No parental consent
